title: Seed DevCo Governance Playbook
description: Living doc: identity separation (personal vs DevCo), asset registry (domains, accounts, services), contributor model, code review policies, licensing. Seed from everything built Jan 31-Feb 1.

comments.author: jeff@devco
comments.body: Seeded governance-playbook.md at biz/governance-playbook.md. 8 sections: Identity Separation, Asset Registry, Repo Governance, Secrets Management, Contributor Model, Code Review, Licensing, Security Posture. All sourced from Jan 31-Feb 1 work. Ready for Jeff review.
